cohortName: Acute transverse myelitis referent incident cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (139803) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Acute transverse myelitis referent prevalent cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (139803) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

FDA AESI Encephalomyelitis IP events
logicDescription: All events of Encephalomyelitis (includes myelitis, encephalitis and inflammatory CNS disorder without descendants) limited to events with overlapping inpatient visit with no such events in prior clean window period (183 days). No continuous observation period requirement. Persons exit the cohort on start_date + 1 day.

cohortName: FDA AESI Encephalomyelitis IP event episodes for incidence characterization
logicDescription: All events of Encephalomyelitis (includes myelitis, encephalitis and inflammatory CNS disorder without descendants) limited to events with overlapping inpatient visit. No continuous observation period requirement. Persons exit the cohort on start_date + 183 days.

cohortName: FDA AESI Transverse myelitis IP events
logicDescription: All events of Transverse Myelitis with overlapping inpatient visit with no such events in prior clean window period (365 days). No continuous observation period requirement. Persons exit the cohort on start_date + 1 day.

cohortName: FDA AESI Transverse myelitis IP event episodes for incidence characterization
logicDescription: All events of Transverse Myelitis with overlapping inpatient visit. No continuous observation period requirement. Persons exit the cohort on start_date + 365 days.
